s.action: Weave hand in an s shape, like a snake, and say ssssss
s.story: A snake slithers through the grass making a 'sssss' sound
s.song: The snake goes sss, sss, sss, sss, sss, sss

a.action: Wiggle fingers above elbow as if ants crawling on you and say a, a, a
a.story: Ants are crawling up your arm, making you say 'a, a, a'
a.song: Ants on my arm, a, a, a, a, a, a

t.action: Turn head from side to side as if watching tennis and say t, t, t
t.story: Watch the tennis ball go back and forth, saying 't, t, t'
t.song: Tennis, tennis, t, t, t, t, t, t

i.action: Pretend to be a mouse by wiggling fingers at end of nose and squeak i, i, i
i.story: A little mouse squeaks 'i, i, i'
i.song: Inky the mouse, i, i, i, i, i, i

p.action: Pretend to puff out candles and say p, p, p
p.story: Blow out the candles on a birthday cake, saying 'p, p, p'
p.song: Puff out the candles, p, p, p, p, p, p

n.action: Make a noise, as if you are a plane, hold arms out and say nnnnnn
n.story: An airplane flies overhead making 'nnnnnn' sound
n.song: The plane goes nnn, nnn, nnn, nnn, nnn, nnn

c.action: Raise hands and snap fingers as if playing castanets and say ck, ck, ck
c.story: Click the castanets together, saying 'ck, ck, ck'
c.song: Click the castanets, ck, ck, ck, ck, ck, ck

k.action: Raise hands and snap fingers as if playing castanets and say ck, ck, ck
k.story: Click the castanets together, saying 'ck, ck, ck'
k.song: Click the castanets, ck, ck, ck, ck, ck, ck

e.action: Pretend to tap an egg on the side of a pan and crack it into the pan, saying eh, eh, eh
e.story: Crack an egg into a pan, saying 'eh, eh, eh'
e.song: Crack the egg, eh, eh, eh, eh, eh, eh

h.action: Hold hand in front of mouth panting as if you are out of breath and say h, h, h
h.story: You're out of breath after running, saying 'h, h, h'
h.song: Out of breath, h, h, h, h, h, h

r.action: Pretend to be a puppy holding a piece of rag, shaking head from side to side, and say rrrrrr
r.story: A puppy shakes a rag, growling 'rrrrrr'
r.song: The puppy growls, rrr, rrr, rrr, rrr, rrr, rrr

m.action: Rub tummy as if seeing tasty food and say mmmmmm
m.story: You see delicious food and say 'mmmmmm'
m.song: Mmm, tasty food, mmm, mmm, mmm, mmm, mmm, mmm

d.action: Beat hands up and down as if playing a drum and say d, d, d
d.story: Beat the drum, saying 'd, d, d'
d.song: Beat the drum, d, d, d, d, d, d

g.action: Spiral hand down, as if water going down the drain, and say g, g, g
g.story: Water goes down the drain, making 'g, g, g' sound
g.song: Down the drain, g, g, g, g, g, g

o.action: Pretend to turn light switch on and off and say o, o; o, o
o.story: Turn the light on and off, saying 'o, o'
o.song: Turn the light, o, o, o, o, o, o

u.action: Pretend to be putting up an umbrella and say u, u, u
u.story: Put up your umbrella, saying 'u, u, u'
u.song: Up with the umbrella, u, u, u, u, u, u

l.action: Pretend to lick a lollipop and say llllll
l.song: Lick the lollipop, lll, lll, lll, lll, lll, lll

f.action: Let hands gently come together as if toy fish deflating, and say ffffff
f.song: The fish goes fff, fff, fff, fff, fff, fff

b.action: Pretend to hit a ball with a bat and say b, b, b
b.story: Hit a ball with a bat, saying 'b, b, b'
b.song: Hit the ball, b, b, b, b, b, b

ai.action: Cup your hand over ear, as if hard of hearing and say /ai/, /ai/, /ai/
ai.story: Cup your hand over your ear as if hard of hearing, saying 'ai, ai, ai'
ai.song: I can hear, ai, ai, ai, ai, ai, ai

j.action: Pretend to wobble on a plate and say j, j, j
j.story: Jelly wobbles on a plate, saying 'j, j, j'
j.song: Wobbly jelly, j, j, j, j, j, j

oa.action: Cover your mouth and say /oa/ in surprise!
oa.story: Cover your mouth in surprise, saying 'oa!'
oa.song: Oh no! oa, oa, oa, oa, oa, oa

ie.action: Salute like a sailor and say /ie/, /ie/
ie.story: Salute like a sailor, saying 'ie, ie'
ie.song: Salute, ie, ie, ie, ie, ie, ie

ee.action: Pretend your hands are donkey's ears. Flap them up and bray like a donkey and say /ee/
ee.story: Put your hands on your head like donkey ears, flap them up and bray, saying 'ee'
ee.song: Donkey ears, ee, ee, ee, ee, ee, ee

or.action: Pretend your hands are donkey's ears. Flap them down and bray like a donkey and say /or/
or.story: Put your hands on your head like donkey ears, flap them down and bray, saying 'or'
or.song: Donkey bray, or, or, or, or, or, or

z.action: Put arms out at sides and pretend to be a bee, saying zzzzzz
z.story: A bee flies around, making 'zzzzzz' sound
z.song: The bee goes zzz, zzz, zzz, zzz, zzz, zzz

w.action: Blow on to open hand, as if you are the wind, and say wh, wh, wh
w.story: The wind blows, saying 'wh, wh, wh'
w.song: The wind blows, wh, wh, wh, wh, wh, wh

ng.action: Say /ng/ as you pretend to lift weight above your head
ng.story: Pretend to lift a heavy weight above your head, saying 'ng'
ng.song: Lift the weight, ng, ng, ng, ng, ng, ng

v.action: Pretend to be holding the steering wheel of a van and say vvvvvv
v.song: Drive the van, vvv, vvv, vvv, vvv, vvv, vvv

oo.action: Pretend to be a cuckoo bird and jut head forward to say the short /oo/ sound, or jut head backward to say the long /oo/ sound
oo.story: Be a cuckoo bird - jut head forward for short /oo/ or backward for long /oo/
oo.song: Cuckoo clock, oo, oo, oo, oo, oo, oo

y.action: Pretend to eat yogurt from a spoon and say y, y, y
y.song: Yummy yogurt, y, y, y, y, y, y

x.action: Make the /ks/ sound as you shoot with a laser toy gun
x.story: Shoot with a laser toy gun, making the /ks/ sound
x.song: Laser gun, ks, ks, ks, ks, ks, ks

ch.action: Move arms like the piston train and say /ch/, /ch/
ch.story: Move your arms like a train's piston, saying 'ch, ch'
ch.song: The train goes ch, ch, ch, ch, ch, ch

sh.action: Place index finger over lips in a shushing gesture and say /sh/
sh.story: Put your finger over your lips to shush, saying 'sh'
sh.song: Be quiet, sh, sh, sh, sh, sh, sh

th.action: Pretend to be a clown and stick your tongue out only a little to say the voiced /th/, or stick your tongue out further to say the voiceless /TH/
th.story: Be a clown - stick tongue out a little for voiced /th/ or further for voiceless /TH/
th.song: Stick out tongue, th, th, th, th, th, th

qu.action: Make a duck's beak with hinged hands and say /qu/, /qu/, /qu/
qu.story: Make a duck's beak with your hinged hands, saying 'qu, qu, qu'
qu.song: The duck quacks, qu, qu, qu, qu, qu, qu

ou.action: Pretend your thumb is being pricked by a needle and say /ou/!
ou.story: Your thumb is pricked by a needle, saying 'ou!'
ou.song: Ouch! ou, ou, ou, ou, ou, ou

oi.action: Pretend to be a sailor, cup hands around mouth and say passing boat /oi/!
oi.story: Be a sailor, cup hands around mouth and shout to a passing boat, saying 'oi!'
oi.song: Ship ahoy! oi, oi, oi, oi, oi, oi

ue.action: Point to people around you and say /ue/, /ue/, /ue/
ue.story: Point to people around you, saying 'ue, ue, ue'
ue.song: Point to you, ue, ue, ue, ue, ue, ue

er.action: Roll hands over and over each other like a mixer and say /er/, /er/, /er/
er.story: Roll your hands over and over like a mixer, saying 'er, er, er'
er.song: Mix it up, er, er, er, er, er, er

ar.action: Open mouth wide and say ah
ar.story: Open mouth wide at the doctor, saying 'ah'
ar.song: Open wide, ar, ar, ar, ar, ar, ar
